comments:
I had gotten to about page 3 of the Web service wizard when I realized I had
missed something on the first page. I went back and clicked Back once too many
times and ended up at the Eclipse wizard dialog. I clicked Next, made my
changes, and then clicked Next again. The Object Selection page was now
completely empty, and when I tried to do anything I received the internal NPE
error below:

Pages 1 thru 3 have been collapsed into one, so the scenario and specific problem no longer apply. If you find any similar errors, say with moving from page 1 to 2 then back again, please reopen.
